TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: 定义用于将 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 的 部件添加到 XPS 包中的方法。

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`DocumentStructure`的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，您可以在下获得[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: 将 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 的 部件添加到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 包。

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 包的 部件。

span.span: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`DocumentStructure`的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，您可以在下获得[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
